page.title: 07ART & LEISURE EASTLEIGH
page.content: Mainly centered around the old town hall.The area is limited culturally. There are many small local arts societies which cater for minority interests.Entertainment,in the main,is provided by local talent,but there are occasional vists by small professional companies. The largest of the local amateur groups is{The Operatic and Musical {Society. } The town has a good sports centre which includes a swimming pool,tennis courts,indoor courts for squash and badminton,bowling greens,cricket pitches and a municipal golf course which is used as one venue for the W.P.G.A. summer circuit.There are also some satelite playing fields under the control of the borough leisure authority.
